channel.title: Xcode on Learner Loft
channel.description: Recent content in Xcode on Learner Loft

item.title: Access specifier in Swift
item.description: Control your code’s accessibility What is Access specifier? Access specifier is keyword which helps in Access control of code block. Access control restricts access to the parts of your code from code in other source files and modules. Encapsulation is one pillar of Object Oriented Programming and access specifiers helps in encapsulating. What is Encapsulation? Encapsulation is defined as the wrapping up of data under a single unit. It is the mechanism that binds together code and the data it manipulates.

item.title: Generate timebase UUID in swift
item.description: Everything you need to know about UUID First of all what is UUID? In software development as soon as we encounter assigning/fetching piece of data uniquely first thing that pops up in mind is UUID(universally unique identifier). so this is how wikipedia defines it. A universally unique identifier (UUID) is an identifier standard used in software construction. A UUID is simply a 128-bit value. The meaning of each bit is defined by any of several variants.

item.title: Wireless Debugging on Xcode 9
item.description: Apple announced wireless debugging feature on Xcode 9 at WWDC 17. Apple say Cut the Cord Choose any of your iOS or tvOS devices on the local network to install, run, and debug your apps — without a USB cord plugged into your Mac. Simply click the ‘Connect via Network’ checkbox the first time you use a new iOS device, and that device will be available over the network from that point forward.
